name: Chocolate Covered Blueberries
author: econo1943
summary: Chocolate Covered Blueberries! These are unbelievably wonderful. Eat your fruit and have some chocolate too!
ingredients: 2 cups fresh blueberries, rinsed and dried
directions: Melt chocolate in a glass bowl in the microwave, or in a metal bowl set over a pan of simmering water
Stir frequently until melted and smooth
Remove from the heat, and stir in the shortening until melted
Line a baking sheet  with waxed paper
Add blueberries to the chocolate, and stir gently to coat
Spoon small clumps of blueberries onto the waxed paper
Store in a cool place in an airtight container
